description:
Learn to play Christmas Piano Songs thorugh this course. In this first course, you will learn how to play Deck The Halls, playing chords and melody.

If you want to play Christmas songs, this course will guide you through practical videos, how to play each hand separately and the how to play both hands at the same time. There is an important space in this course dedicated to read the written notes, this is because you need to know what are you playing!! But don´t worry it contains the exact amount of music theory so you can understand it without spending too much time.

This course is divided in 3 chapters:

1.- Theory and piano tips.

2.- Reading the notes of the song.

3.- Playing the song!

This course has material that can be downloaded, in order to improve your experience offline.

So, there´s nothing to loose and so much fun to have! Enjoy playing this song and be prepared for the holidays!!
title: Christmas Piano Songs For The Very Beginner Vol. I
